sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The libxml2 package contains libxml2 libraries, xmllint and xmlcatalog.

sect3.title: libxml2 libraries
sect3.para: libxml2 libraries provide the functions for programs to parse files that use the XML format.

sect3.title: xmllint
sect3.para: xmllint parses XML files and outputs reports (based upon options) to detect errors in XML coding.

sect3.title: xmlcatalog
sect3.para: xmlcatalog allows users to monitor and manipulate XML and SGML catalogs.
